org.hibernate.query.sqm

Interface SqmPathSource<J>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bindable<J>, SqmExpressable<J>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BagPersistentAttribute<D,E>, EntityDomainType<J>, ListPersistentAttribute<D,E>, MapPersistentAttribute<D,K,V>, PluralPersistentAttribute<D,C,E>, SetPersistentAttribute<D,E>, SingularPersistentAttribute<D,J>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SqmPolymorphicRootDescriptor

    public interface SqmPathSource<J>
extends SqmExpressable<J>, Bindable<J>
    Represents parts of the application's domain model that can be used to create SqmPath nodes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface javax.persistence.metamodel.Bindable

        Bindable.BindableType

    • Method Detail

      • getPathName

        String getPathName()
        The name of this thing. Mainly used in logging and when creating a NavigablePath

        DomainType<?> getSqmPathType()
        The type of SqmPaths this source creates. Corollary to JPA's Bindable.getBindableJavaType()

      • findSubPathSource

        SqmPathSource<?> findSubPathSource(String name)
                            throws IllegalPathUsageException
        Find a SqmPathSource by name relative to this source.
        Throws:
        IllegalPathUsageException - to indicate that this source cannot be de-referenced
